name: Mel Gibson's Head
description: Mel GibsonCharacter InformationGenderStatusSpeciesFormerly:HumanCurrently:Head in JarPlanetEarthBackground InformationFirst appearance"That's Lobstertainment!"Mel Columcille Gerard Gibson(born January 3, 1956) is an American actor and film director. By2999, his still living head will be preserved and on display at theHead MuseuminNew New York City. He was part of the tour thatFry,Leela,BenderandZoidbergtook ofHollywoodand was said by the Tour Guide to be the star of the movie "Bravehead".

name: Small Rock Alien
description: Small Rock AlienCharacter InformationGenderNuchachoStatusSpeciesRock alienPlanetNeutopiaBackground InformationFirst appearance"Neutopia"Small Rock Alienis an inhabitant of Neutopia. In June3011, she encountered a group of lost Earthican men among which were members of thePlanet Express Crewand offered to help them find their way, but they told her off.

name: Hedonismbot
description: Hedonismbot made his first appearance in "Crimes of the Hot", where he was one of the many robots negatively affected by global warming. He also contributes the most out of any robot to causing global warming.

name: Nannybot 1.0
description: TheNannybot 1.0is a scary lookingrobotthat replaces humans as a nanny. It looks after kids and kids seem to love it. It was shown atRoboticon 3003. A milk bottle can come out from its mouth.

name: Private Carroll
description: Private CarrollCharacter InformationGenderStatusAliveSpeciesHumanPlanetEarthProfessionDemocratic Order of Planets(DOOP) soldierBackground InformationFirst appearanceRo-Botox

name: Maxi-Padlock Warden
description: Maxi-Padlock WardenCharacter InformationGenderStatusSpeciesHumanPlanetEarthProfessionPrison WardenBackground InformationFirst appearance"Into the Wild Green Yonder"Voiced byDawnn LewisMaxi-Padlock Wardenruns theMaxi-Padlockprison, a high-security women's prison onEarth. As the prison is privately operated, the Warden runs it as cheaply as possible which includes leaving punishments for the prisoners to administer. A defiantAmychallenges the Warden and is struck by her baton, which is an infla...

name: Jockey
description: Jockeyworked forLeoandInez Wongracing their horses until they retired him. They unsuccessfully tried to set him up withAmy. He later catchesBenderdosing horses (so he can win a bet at the racetrack) and is dosed himself.

name: Tudor man
description: Tudor manworks atPast-O-Ramaand is dressed as a character from English Tudor times. Due toFry's 20th century clothing, he mistakes him for a fellow employee and tells him to move a car.

name: Fatbot
description: Fatbotis a minor character onFuturamawho belonged to the Fratbots. When under stress he tends to eat anything on hand which is usually something valuable ofDean Vernon's. He ate the Dean's most prized possession, his bottled ship. Later, in the same episode, he ate a valuable portrait of the Dean. It's revealed at the end of the episode "Mars University" that he caught a computer virus in Tijuana, presumably caused by the loss of his virginity during "Robotsex". Later, he had to be rebooted. ...

name: Fabricio
description: Fabriciowas a student at Columbiac University and the leader of the street gang The Ink Jets. He inductsBenderinto the street gang and takes him to get his first gang tattoo at a parlor where both he and the tattoo artist (who may be named NOSd3, or "Epson" upside down) are gunned down by members of a rival gang. Bender disposes of Fabricio's body under a dumpster in the alley where he received his gang ring and attempts to ease his sorrows using "Spark".

name: Guenter
description: Guenteris a monkey made super-intelligent by theElectronium Hat, an invention byProfessor Farnsworth. Guenter was originally an experiment to see if a monkey could pass a course atMars University. Seemingly on top of the world, Guenter was both smart and cute, makingFryextremely jealous. After Guenter's parents, a pair of monkeys possessing normal levels of intelligence, cause a scene at a university party, Guenter decides to revert to his natural state by removing the hat.

attributes.Job: Student President of the FOX Network
attributes.Voiced By: With hat: Tress MacNeille Without hat: Frank Welker

name: John Turturro's Head
description: John Michael Turturro(b. February 28, 1957) is an American actor. By2999, his still living head will be preserved and on display at theHead MuseuminNew New York City.

attributes.Species: Formerly: Human Currently: Head in Jar

name: Destructor
description: He first appeared in "Raging Bender" in which he wasBenderfinal opponent in robot wrestling. Bender tries his best to fight him, but Destructor is too durable and he beats on Bender, at one point knocking off his jaw and teeth.Leeladiscovers that MasterFnog, Destructor's alien trainer and Leela's former martial arts teacher, is controlling him. Leela fights him for revenge, hating the way he disrespected her because she is a female. She manages to defeat him by slamming Destructor's fist onto...

name: Edna
description: Ednawas aDecapodianwoman who went to school withZoidberg. She carried more eggs than any other female of her species: as such she wanted to mate with a rock star. She liked to talk about things of little importance at great length (much to the annoyance of those talking to her.) Her apartment is decorated like a fish tank.

attributes.Appearance: " Why Must I Be a Crustacean in Love? "

name: Dr. Schlovinowitz
description: Dr. SchlovinowitzCharacter InformationGenderStatusSpeciesHumanPlanetEarthProfessionDoctorWhale keeperBackground InformationFirst appearance"Bender's Big Score"Voiced byTress MacNeilleDr. Schlovinowitzwas a whale keeper. She is only seen interacting with time duplicatePhilip J. Fry I, laterLars Fillmore. She is shown in the years2003and 2010. In 2010, she tells Fry thatLeeluis leaving the aquarium. She is never seen again.

name: King of Space
description: King of Spaceopposes the marriage of his son, thePrince of Space, toLeelaas she is a commoner.Frychallenges him to a duel, which if Fry loses, will mean his death. The duel is a joust and Leela acts as Fry's champion. She wins the duel but unknowingly, kills the Prince who secretly championed for the King.

name: Ron Jeremy's Head
description: More than a dozen women have publicly accused Jeremy of sexual assault. Several of the allegations relate to his appearances at fan conventions, alleging that he would grope and insert his fingers into attendees without their consent. In June 2020, Jeremy was charged with sexual assault.

attributes.Species: Formerly: Human Currently: Head in Jar

name: Sick Vending Machine Robot
description: An unnamedVending Machine Robotthat is in theHal Institute for Criminally Insane Robots. It is unknown why it is in the Institute. Its sickness, which causes it to cough upBachelor Bars, may be the reason. This robot wasPhilip J. Fry I's only source of food during his nightmarish time in the robot asylum.Bender Bending Rodríguezdescribed him as a "strange boy".

name: Japanese UN diplomat
description: Japanese UN diplomatis a United Nations diplomat from Japan, who lost his left arm.

name: Tour Guide
description: She first appears inLess Than Herowhen theZookeeperrobs the museum. She says "Please don't feed the animals!" only to be grabbed and eaten by an elephant, ironically. She later appears inJurassic Bark, showing the exhibit ofPanucci's Pizza, with no explanation of her return.

attributes.Job: Tour guide at the natural history museum

name: Raoul Inglis
description: Raoul seems to be the soft spoken one of the group unless something official or important comes up. He rarely wastes his time with unimportant comments, but when he does uses an extremely sarcastic tone.

name: Animatronio
description: Animatroniowas created byLeonardo da Vinci, as an artist model while that great thinker lived onEarth. When Leonardo returned to hisPlanet(Vinci), he left behind Animatronio to guide the secret shadow group of intellectuals that would follow. In the mean time, he spoke with Pope John the Patient (who died while waiting for Animatronio to return) and took the place of Saint James, whom Leonardo replaced in his famous paintingThe Last Supper, leaving Animatronio's legs exposed to serve as hints...

name: Fishy Joe
description: Joseph Gilman, often referred to asFishy Joe, is the owner of various restaurant chains, such asFishy Joe'sand Family Bros. Pizza. He is cruel, selfish, heartless, as well as only cares about getting money, which makes him a scrooge.

name: Beck's Head
description: Beck Hansen(bornBek David Campbell; July 8, 1970), better known asBeck, is an American musician. By3002, his still living head is preserved and on display at theHead MuseuminNew New York City. He andBenderwent on a tour together in3001.

attributes.Species: Formerly: Human Currently: Head in a Jar

name: Andy Goldman
description: When Fry visited the ruins of his old town, Andy's mutant body overheard and asked if he knew Andy, to which he confirmed and asked why. The mutant revealed that he mutated from him and Fry asked what Andy was up to and Andy speaks to him and reveals that he's a teacher, before he departs. Leela remarks he seems nice, though Fry remarked when he's sober.

name: Fourth Doctor
description: Fourth DoctorCharacter InformationGenderStatusAliveSpeciesTime LordPlanetGallifreyBackground InformationFirst appearanceMöbius Dick

name: Unionbot
description: UnionbotCharacter InformationGenderStatusAliveSpeciesRobotPlanetEarthBackground InformationFirst appearance"Your Mother Wears Pilot Boots"

name: Ross Perot's Head
description: Henry Ross Perot(June 27, 1930 – July 9, 2019), better known asRoss Perot, was an American businessman notable for his role as a third-party candidate in the 1992 presidential election. By2999, his still living head was preserved and on display in theHead MuseuminNew New York City.

attributes.Species: Formerly: Human Currently: Head in Jar

name: Morris Katz
description: Morris Katz, better known asProfessor Katz, was long known as a brilliant scientist atMars University, but was in3010revealed to be one of those dog-operated puppets that's been adapted for use by a cat. He was secretly controlled by theThubanian Leaderuntil the big reveal. It is uncertain if he has always been a puppet, or if, at some point, he was aHumanwho, after his death, was used as a puppet.

name: Hair Robot
description: Hair Robotappears briefly in the rec-room of theHal Institute for Criminally Insane Robots. It's likely that he thinks he is ahumanand gives out wigs if people lose their hair.

attributes.Job: Wigs supplier Patient at the Hal Institute

name: Bender Bending Rodríguez's First Born Son
description: Bender Bending Rodríguez's first born son(born May 11, 2997 - died June 29, 3008) wasBender'sfirst born son. His appearance was similar to how Bender appears as a child. Bender gave him toBeelzebotin return for anArmy of the Damned. The Robot Devil himself commented that he felt Bender's actions were brutal even by his standards as Bender kicked his son through the glass of the Devil's office into a pit of lava, killing him.

name: Beelzebot
description: Beelzebot, commonly referred to as theRobot Devil, is one of the recurring antagonists inFuturama. He seems to resemble the Devil/Satan/Lucifer of manyEarthreligions. He lives inRobot Hellalong with many other sinners. He is talented at playing thefiddle, therefore, he owns a golden one (presumably a reference to "The Devil Went Down to Georgia," which mentions both a golden fiddle and the Devil). He lives in New Jersey and runs Robot Hell in an abandoned amusement park calledReckless Ted's F...

name: Tooth fairy
description: Thetooth fairyis a fantasy figure of early childhood.

name: Encyclopod
description: TheEnyclopodwas one of the first beings to come into existence. Its first form was a frog or snake, then it evolved into a gigantic space ray. The encyclopod also preserves the life of any species, including extinct and endangered species. It has a miniature world on its back in the shape of a dome, with extinct plants and animals in it. The Encyclopod has special attachments that help contain DNA. The Encyclopod drifted into infinite space after giving birth to life.

name: Hugh Man
description: Hugh ManCharacter InformationGenderStatusSpeciesDecapodianPlanetEarthProfessionDouble agentBackground InformationFirst appearance"A Taste of Freedom"Voiced byPhil LaMarrHugh Manwas serving on theEarth'sflagship, theNimbus, during the Decapod Invasion of 3002. During the battle, 25-Star GeneralZapp Brannigantrusted him with the activation codes for the global defense network. Hugh Man was actually aDecapodianin disguise, but due to the incompetence of Zapp Brannigan, his anonymity was protecte...

name: Clearcutter
description: TheClearcutteris a robot equipped with an ax and chainsaw. He was a member of theUltimate Robot Fighting League(URFL) and foughtBender. Bender won the fight, but it was a set up. It's also wondered if the Clearcutter can switch either his axe or chainsaw into a drill, because at one point in the fightLeelapoints out that he gets a drill through his head, although this is unknown. He is possibly a Canadian robot.

name: Butch's Mother
description: Butch's motherCharacter InformationGenderStatusSpeciesHumanPlanetEarthRelativesSon:ButchBackground InformationFirst appearance"The Cryonic Woman"Voiced byTress MacNeilleButch's motheris a minor character, who turns up in a car to takeButchand his gang to Hebrew class.

name: Hobsy
description: ThePlanet Express crewvisited the mansion in September of3010on their 100th mission to deliver a soufflé Mrs. Astor had ordered fromElzar's Fine Cuisine. Hobsy fed the soufflé to a few dozens of dalmatians Mrs. Astor keeps in an isolated room. However, as the souflée contained a few drops of dangerously explosive nitroglycerine, the dogs who ate it could have been badly injured, or even killed.

name: Stoner
description: Stonerrepresents the poorly worded and spelt political party "Dudes for the Legalation of of Hemp". WhenAmyasked him about the part, he reached for a brochure, pulled out a burger and ate it.

name: Suspendington
description: Dean Suspendingtonis the head of Columbiac University, whichBenderattends for all of 32 seconds before falling in with a rough crowd ("The Inkjets," aRobotstreet-gang) and dropping out, but not before doing $9000 worth of damage to the Dean's wife.
